title: Looking to Buy T215-1 Red Cross
author: Browncow75

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy T215-1 Red Cross
posts.post_content: Any available? Let me know! Thanks!:D

2 purchased, DESPERATELY seeking more. Low grade, common players, etc. I NEED 'EM ALL! Please email if you have any you are thinking of selling. I am solely working on this set, and have sold off all my other cards to focus on it, so unfortunately I dont have any trade bait. Cash sale preferred. Thanks again!

 Brandon
